name: Cutie Suzuki no Ringside Angel
description:
Cutie Suzuki no Ringside Angel (キューティー鈴木のリングサイドエンジェル, "Cutie Suzuki's Ringside Angel") is a 1990 Japan-exclusive Sega Mega Drive video game about female professional wrestling. It features the famous female Japanese wrestler Cutie Suzuki.

As the first video game based on women's professional wrestling for the Sega Mega Drive, it played a pivotal role in establishing females as protagonists in 16-bit video games, predating Alisia Dragoon by two years.
